item.title: Scribe Nginx Build
item.description: Over the past few months, we'd found ourselves building custom Nginx packages by hand regularly with each new Ubuntu Nginx Mainline release, and it was becoming quite tedious. Having never worked with Launchpad prior, we began our journey by simply writing a script that would handle building a reliable Debian package for our own internal use.

item.title: A Speedy Web
item.description: At Scribe Inc., we are constantly working to better the experience of our clients. Because our internal staff and (Well-Formed Document Workflow) WFDW clients both rely heavily on our web applications, we strive to improve the effectiveness of these services. Since the release of our newest platform, we've migrated from Apache to Nginx.

item.title: Text Messaging Library
item.description: Recently, we wanted to be able to send text message alerts to a group of individuals as an early-warning method to identify degradation or failure of our systems. While there are an array of messaging api options, we settled on Clockwork.

item.title: New GitHub Website
item.description: Welcome to the new Scribe github.io website! This blog, powered by the wonderfully simple Jekyll, will feature news, information, and announcements on Scribe's contributions to the open source community.
